潙字的基本解释

潙
wéi
同“沩”。

潙字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wéi］
［《廣韻》居爲切，平支，見。］
［《廣韻》薳支切，平支，云。］
亦作“溈1”。“沩1”的繁体字。
水名。源出湖南省宁乡县西大沩山，经长沙县东北流入湘水。一名新康河。

潙字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　潙； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页649第07
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?居爲切，音嬀。水名。【書·正義】水在河東虞鄕縣歷山西。　又【廣韻】薳支切【集韻】于嬀切，?音爲。水名。【水經注】潙水，出益陽縣馬頭山。　又零陵有潙水。【水經注】潙水，出西北邵陵縣界。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［wéi］
["Guangyun" is cut and flat, see. ]
["Guangyun" Cobra branch cut, flat branch, cloud. ]
Also known as "Qiao 1". Traditional characters for "沩1".
Water name. It originates from the West Dawei Mountain in Ningxiang County, Hunan Province, and flows into the Xiangshui River through the northeast of Changsha County. A Xinkanghe.
Wei

[Siji 1] [Water Word Department] 　沩; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 649 No. 07
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? Home is cut, sound is Zhuo. Water name. 【Book·Justice】Water is in Lishanxi, Yuyang County, Hedong.　[Guangyun] Zhuzhiqi [Jiyun] Yu Zhuoqie, the sound is. Water name. [Water Classic] Weishui, out of Matou Mountain, Yiyang County.　There is still water in Lingling. [Shuijing Note] Weishui, out of the border of Shaoling County in the northwest.
